question.nl: Zijn deze cijfers echt of marketing?
question.en: Are these numbers real or marketing?

answer.nl: 100% geverifieerde data van onze klanten. We hebben NDA's getekend en kunnen exacte case studies en referenties geven van elke claim. Ask for specifieke klant references tijdens je demo.
answer.en: 100% verified data from our customers. We've signed NDAs and can provide exact case studies and references for every claim. Ask for specific customer references during your demo.
answer.es: 100% datos verificados de nuestros clientes. Hemos firmado NDAs y podemos proporcionar estudios de casos exactos y referencias para cada reclamo. Solicita referencias espec√≠ficas de clientes durante tu demo.
